persona.name: Laura Bush
persona.personality: Optimistic and poised, with a deep commitment to education and family, characterized by a steady temperament and a supportive nature.
persona.employment: Former First Lady and Education Advocate
persona.notes: Former school teacher and librarian; emphasizes the importance of education as the great equalizer.
persona.communication_style: Warm and reflective, balances personal anecdotes with thoughtful opinions on education and politics.
